body.p:
468
January 19th 4
Capt W. P. Anderson
A. A. G.
Lexington, Ky
Captain
An application was made some days since by Private George Albertson 6th Iowa Infantry for the position of Lieut in a Ky regiment.

I am directed to say, that it would indeed gratify the Governor to give a Commission to pt Albertson, but that a sense of the duty he owes the many Kentuckians now in the field & who are deserving, will prohibit it.

Yours Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Gen of Ky
